docs.snippet: LONDON, July 10 (AP) Britain and Uruguay will open the World Soccer Cup championship at Wembley Stadium tomorrow night, with some players facing tests for the possible use of drugs.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 10 (AP) Britain and Uruguay will open the World Soccer Cup championship at Wembley Stadium tomorrow night, with some players facing tests for the possible use of drugs.
docs.abstract: matches set, London; players to be examined for use of drugs after each match

headline.main: Soccer World Turns Eyes on London Today; Drug Tests Ordered for Players in Cup Tourney

docs.snippet: Joey Archer became an evenmoney choice yesterday to defeat the middleweight champion, Emile Griffith, in their 15-round title bout at Madison Square Garden tomorrow night.
docs.lead_paragraph: Joey Archer became an evenmoney choice yesterday to defeat the middleweight champion, Emile Griffith, in their 15-round title bout at Madison Square Garden tomorrow night.

headline.main: ARCHER EVEN MONEY TO DEFEAT GRIFFITH

docs.snippet: LONDON, July 11 The eighth World Soccer Cup tournament opened tonight amid traditional British pageantry but with a disappointing match between England and Uruguay.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 11 The eighth World Soccer Cup tournament opened tonight amid traditional British pageantry but with a disappointing match between England and Uruguay.

headline.main: POOR SHOTMAKING COSTLY TO BRITISH; Greaves Misses Open Cage  75,000 at Wembley as Queen Hails Series

docs.snippet: CRANFORD, N.J., July 12-- William F. Schorn, an architect who specialized in hospitals and ship interiors, died today in Princeton (N.J.) Hospital after a short illness. He was 57 years old and lived at 9 Claremont Place.
docs.lead_paragraph: CRANFORD, N.J., July 12-- William F. Schorn, an architect who specialized in hospitals and ship interiors, died today in Princeton (N.J.) Hospital after a short illness. He was 57 years old and lived at 9 Claremont Place.

headline.main: WILLIAM SCHORN, AN ARCHITECT, 57; Designer of Hospitals and of Ship Interiors Dies

docs.snippet: LONDON, July 12 (UPI)-- Brazil, the defending champion, opened bid for a third straight World Soccer Cup today with a 2-0 victory over Bulgaria at Liverpool.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 12 (UPI)-- Brazil, the defending champion, opened bid for a third straight World Soccer Cup today with a 2-0 victory over Bulgaria at Liverpool.

headline.main: Brazil Defeats Bulgaria, 2-0, in World Soccer; Pele and Garrincha Score--Soviet and Germans Win

docs.snippet: LONDON, July 13 (Reuters) Italy, a two-time winner of the World Soccer Cup, lived up to its promise as a likely finalist in the 1966 series tonight by gaining a 2-0 victory over Chile.
docs.lead_paragraph: LONDON, July 13 (Reuters) Italy, a two-time winner of the World Soccer Cup, lived up to its promise as a likely finalist in the 1966 series tonight by gaining a 2-0 victory over Chile.

headline.main: ITALY, ARGENTINA SOCCER VICTORS; Portugal Wins Mexico Ties France in Cup Play
